headline: The Best Stocks to Invest $1,000 in Right Now
summary: Alibaba offers an inexpensive way to invest in AI.  Amazon has multiple growth opportunities, including AI, robotics, e-commerce, and satellite internet.  Vertex Pharmaceuticals is a cash cow with new drugs on the market and a promising pipeline.
